channel.title: Designing the future as if people mattered
channel.description: Designing the future as if people mattered

item.title: WE ARE AS GODS AND HAVE TO GET GOOD AT IT
item.description:
WE ARE AS GODS AND HAVE TO GET GOOD AT IT

About 40 years ago I wore a button that said, "Why haven't we seen a photograph of the whole Earth yet?" Then we finally saw the pictures. What did it do for us? The shift that has happened in 40 years which mainly has to do with climate change.
